API Collection# LazySequenceProtocol Implementations

## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/Slice/LazySequenceProtocol-Implementations#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/Swift/Slice/LazySequenceProtocol-Implementations#Instance-Properties)

[`var elements: Self`](/documentation/swift/slice/elements-swift.property)Identical to `self`.### [Instance Methods](/documentation/Swift/Slice/LazySequenceProtocol-Implementations#Instance-Methods)

[`func compactMap<ElementOfResult>((Self.Elements.Element) -> ElementOfResult?) -> LazyMapSequence<LazyFilterSequence<LazyMapSequence<Self.Elements, ElementOfResult?>>, ElementOfResult>`](/documentation/swift/slice/compactmap(_:)-188bn)Returns the non-`nil` results of mapping the given transformation over this sequence.[`func flatMap<SegmentOfResult>((Self.Elements.Element) -> SegmentOfResult) -> LazySequence<FlattenSequence<LazyMapSequence<Self.Elements, SegmentOfResult>>>`](/documentation/swift/slice/flatmap(_:)-1q7p9)Returns the concatenated results of mapping the given transformation over this sequence.[`func flatMap<ElementOfResult>((Self.Elements.Element) -> ElementOfResult?) -> LazyMapSequence<LazyFilterSequence<LazyMapSequence<Self.Elements, ElementOfResult?>>, ElementOfResult>`](/documentation/swift/slice/flatmap(_:)-6ng42)Returns the non-`nil` results of mapping the given transformation over this sequence.[`func joined() -> LazySequence<FlattenSequence<Self.Elements>>`](/documentation/swift/slice/joined()-3bqi4)Returns a lazy sequence that concatenates the elements of this sequence of sequences.[`func map<U>((Self.Element) -> U) -> LazyMapSequence<Self.Elements, U>`](/documentation/swift/slice/map(_:)-87fp1)Returns a `LazyMapSequence` over this `Sequence`. The elements of the result are computed lazily, each time they are read, by calling `transform` function on a base element.### [Type Aliases](/documentation/Swift/Slice/LazySequenceProtocol-Implementations#Type-Aliases)

[`typealias Elements`](/documentation/swift/slice/elements)A `Sequence` that can contain the same elements as this one, possibly with a simpler type.
